description: Comprehensive display device and configuration information collection

video_info.query: SELECT model, manufacturer, driver_version, driver_date FROM video_info;
video_info.description: Graphics card information from osquery video_info table

display_registry_adapters.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Class\{4d36e968-e325-11ce-bfc1-08002be10318}\%\DriverDesc' AND data != '';

display_driver_versions.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Class\{4d36e968-e325-11ce-bfc1-08002be10318}\%\DriverVersion' AND data != '';

display_driver_dates.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Class\{4d36e968-e325-11ce-bfc1-08002be10318}\%\DriverDate' AND data != '';

display_memory_info.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Class\{4d36e968-e325-11ce-bfc1-08002be10318}\%\MemorySize' AND data != '';
display_memory_info.description: Display adapter memory size from registry

display_monitors.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\DISPLAY\%' AND data != '';

display_current_settings.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\%' AND name IN ('DPIScalingVer', 'Win8DpiScaling', 'LogPixels') AND data != '';
display_current_settings.description: Current display DPI and scaling settings

display_accessibility.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path = 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Accessibility\HighContrast' AND data != '';

color_profiles_files.query: SELECT path, filename, size, mtime FROM file WHERE path LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\color\\%.icm' OR path LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\color\\%.icc';
color_profiles_files.description: Color profile files on the system
